body.name: LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet Botanical Collection Building Set for Adults, Valentine Décor for Him or Her, Artificial Flowers with Poppies and Lavender, Unique Gift for Valentines Day, 10313
features: Cultivate Creativity - Build and display a lifelike LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet with this immersive building project for adults. Please note, a vase is not included
Tailor and Adjust – The set features 16 individual stems that can be adjusted, allowing you to tailor the height of the flowers and experiment with different arrangements
DIY Floral Decor – Once complete, this bouquet can be displayed in your own vase as a centerpiece of home decor. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any room in your house

Wildflower Delight –Create a stunning LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet with our DIY set! Perfect for florists and flower lovers alike. Makes a great Mother's Day, Easter, anniversary, birthday, or Valentine gift

Endless Possibilities – Elevate your LEGO flower bouquet game with this versatile building set! Combine with the LEGO Icons Flower Bouquet (10280) to create larger or multiple bouquets. Endless creative possibilities await
body.description: Giving and receiving flowers is always joyful, and this LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet (10313) crafts set for adults puts a creative spin on a timeless gift. Why not celebrate the next special occasion by sending a loved one LEGO flowers that will never wither or need to be watered? Part of the LEGO Botanical Collection, this set for adults is crafted entirely from intricate LEGO pieces. The vibrant flower bouquet features 8 species of wildflowers on adjustable stems. Budding florists and flower lovers can spend hours building and identifying the blooms inspired by cornflowers, lavender, Welsh poppies, cow parsley, leatherleaf ferns, gerbera daisies, larkspur and lupins. Once complete, these LEGO flowers can be displayed in a favorite vase to become an eye-catching piece of home décor that will plant seeds of joy in whichever room they’re placed. This set is part of the LEGO Botanical Collection, which includes elements of plant-based plastic, made using sustainably sourced sugar cane, and makes a fantastic unique gift for flower lovers that will brighten up any home.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.9 4.9 out of 5 stars 3,576 ratings 4.9 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Build a Wildflower Bouquet Ready to let your creativity bloom? Build a piece of beautiful home decor that includes 8 species of wildflower.
Immerse yourself in color The building set provides an immersive building experience for nature-lovers and budding florists.

LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet Bond over blooms Share special moments building together. Arrange the flowers Adjust the 16 stems to customize your display. Can you identify the species? Among the blooms you’ll find Welsh poppies and lavender.
Send a loved one flowers that last forever Flower-lovers will adore creating their own stunning Wildflower Bouquet before displaying it proudly in their home.
Endless bouquet combinations This set can be combined with the LEGO Flower Bouquet 10280 (sold separately) to create a truly unique display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got these from my kids for Christmas. The bouquet is fun to built and looks really cute. It is easy to put together and quite sturdy. Love the colorful flowers. Placed them on my dining room table.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and easy to build! Great for a date night
reviews.reviewText: This set is beautiful once you complete building it! The instructions are very clear and easy to follow. Great gift for anyone who enjoys flowers and Legos. Only thing that's missing is a lego vase. I wish there was an option to buy one to build, I think that would be really neat. However, we will manage with the tradational vase we are using. Loved building this set. Most of the flowers have 2 that you build (2 daisy's, 2 lavender, etc.) This makes for a fun date night because you can each build flowers at the same time. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get ready for some nice relaxing fun!
reviews.reviewText: I have always loved Legos since the time I was just a young kid. My kids grew up with a huge pile to build from, and now my grandkids are almost ready also. However, my wife and I still really enjoy sitting down together, each with a set, and spend some quality time while we build. It's so relaxing, and makes for a fairly inexpensive date night!We found these flower sets when we were looking for another set for my wife to make. We loved the idea and purchased this one. It's a beautiful set and looks great once assembled. She is looking forward to getting the other sets that go with this one to make bigger arrangements.I will say this set, while easy, is not the sturdiest set. Very small pieces and fragile builds make the flowers a small challenge, but worth completing. We will be buying more soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a holiday gift that I put together in three sittings (roughly 1-2 hours each). Despite mildly arthritic hands, it was fun and mostly easy to assemble. Directions are straightforward and clear once you get the hang of them. I will definitely purchase another set for future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I had so much fun putting these together! I think they are so cute and some people dont' even realize they are Lego at first glance. We don't usually get live flowers in the house because our two cats will usually destroy them, but they leave these alone, and I get to have the aesthetic of flowers on the table but also the awesomeness and cleverness of Lego! I'm definitely going to buy more sets like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was the most beautiful Lego I have done yet. The price beat Walmart. It was so fun and honestly looks amazing with my orchid. Buy the bouquet!!!!! I spaced it out over a few mornings of my quiet time. Soooo pretty!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful lego Botanical Set
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife because she is in love with these sets.It has easy to follow instructions and looks fantastic when completed. (it's our dinner table center piece)Pricewise, it's pretty close to what you'll find in stores.For Legos, they look really close to the real thing.If you love pretty plants and Legos this is the set for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Floral Legos a Gift Hit!
reviews.reviewText: This was a Holiday Gift and the Lego collector loved it. The Flowers are tough and stick together even when they fall over. Lego has this down path and they are an awesome looking set.

The LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet Set is a charming and unique addition to the LEGO Botanical Collection. With its vibrant colors and intricate design, this set beautifully captures the essence of a wildflower bouquet. The build process is engaging and enjoyable, offering a satisfying challenge for LEGO enthusiasts of all skill levels. Once completed, the bouquet makes for a stunning display piece, adding a touch of nature and whimsy to any room. Whether you're a fan of LEGO or simply appreciate beautiful craftsmanship, this set is sure to delight. Highly recommended for both children and adults alike.
Fue muy divertido armarlo y las flores están preciosas!
The media could not be loaded. Adorei a qualidade das peças! São super fáceis de encaixar e o resultado final ficou lindo!

reviews.reviewTitle: LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet: A Tranquil Blend of Creativity and Nature for Relaxing Home Décor
reviews.reviewText: The LEGO Icons Wildflower Bouquet Set is a captivating addition to any adult collection, seamlessly blending creativity with nature. This unique home décor piece boasts intricate design, adding a touch of botanical elegance to your space. Assembling the set becomes a therapeutic escape, making it ideal for relieving stress. The finished bouquet's calming beauty transforms your surroundings into a tranquil haven, offering a unique and relaxing atmosphere. LEGO has masterfully crafted a piece that nourishes both creativity and well-being.
Es muy lindo y las instrucciones vienen bastante sencillas de entender. Fue mi primer lego y me encantó. Lo conseguí en precio de oferta porque si considero que su precio es elevado.
